item.title: Report X-2025031177
item.description:
Report X-2025031177

Identified by scraper @ 2025-03-26T21:14:02+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-03-04
  • City: PORTLAND
  • State: OR
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: RESPONDER WAS CALLED TO LEAKING PACKAGE. LEAKER WAS PERSONAL ITEMS, WITH A LEAKING BOTTLE OF ARM HAMMER LAUNDRY DETERGENT AND ENTERED AS DAMAGED AS SUCH. LITHIUM ION BATTERIES (LOOSE RANDOM BATTERY IN PACKAGE) THE PACKAGE ALSO CONTAINS A WET/DRY VAC WITH THE BATTERY ATTACHED AND A FLAMMABLE AEROSOL OF REPEL INSECT REPELLENT. REPORT WAS AMENDED TO PROPERLY DISCLOSE POTENTIAL UNDECLARED HAZMAT.

item.title: Report X-2025030862
item.description:
Report X-2025030862

Identified by scraper @ 2025-03-22T21:13:09+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-03-18
  • City: PORTLAND
  • State: OR
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: FEDERAL EXPRESS CORPORATION
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: During customs inspection at the PDXR location a fiberboard box containing a number of bottles filled with isopropyl alcohol UN1219 was discovered. The outer fiberboard box did not have any DG markings or paperwork required for transport. The shipment was placed into a steel salvage package and is being held at the location for the FAA.
